DocAttribute.Name: QuadraticTerm
DocAttribute.Documentation: The constant that defines the quadratic term in the equation which defines the relation between curvature and arc length for the curve.

DocAttribute.Name: LinearTerm
DocAttribute.Documentation: The constant that defines the linear term in the equation which defines the relation between curvature and arc length for the curve.

DocAttribute.Name: ConstantTerm
DocAttribute.Documentation: The constant that defines the constant term in the equation which defines the relation between curvature and arc length for the curve.
